title: 1890s American League Pin Back Ball 7/8" SOLD Whitehead Hoag AJ Reach
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: 1890s American League Pin Back Ball 7/8" SOLD Whitehead Hoag AJ Reach
posts.post_content:
Offered here is a fantastic Official American League Ball Pin Back with beautiful blue printing with the white background having texture to mimic the ball of its d ay. On the top front it states Reach Trade Mark in the shape of a Ball. In the center is printed American League Ball. On the bottom is printed A.J. Reach Co. Sole Makers Philadelphia. The back has the original paper insert with The Whitehead and Hoag Newark N.J. on top. Allied Printing then Trade Union Label Council Newark N.J. and a list of 3 patents 1894, 1896 and 1898 
SOLD  Shipping net
